text: Kar chale hum fida is a song written by Urdu poet Kaifi Azmi, which featured in the soundtrack of the 1964 Hindi film Haqeeqat. Music director Madan Mohan compiled the music and it was sung by Mohammad Rafi. In her memoirs of her life with her husband, Shaukat Kaifi recalled that the song "achieved the status of an anthem". It has been used in election campaigns in India. == References == == External links == * Category:1964 songs Category:Hindi film songs
title: Kar chale hum fida
